variant.obsolete: Previous histogram didn't differentiate between Stale and Active Tab.

variant.name: ActiveTab
variant.summary: Tabs between 0 and 1 day since last usage.

variant.name: StaleTab
variant.summary: Tabs between 1 and 90 days since last usage.

histogram.name: Commerce.Carts.ExtractionElapsedTime
histogram.summary: Logged when cart content extraction is executed for ChromeCart. This histogram records the elapsed time within the JavaScript, so script parsing/compilation time is excluded. Commerce.Carts.ExtractionExecutionTime is measured in native, and is the end-to-end elapsed time.

histogram.name: Commerce.Carts.ExtractionExecutionTime
histogram.summary: Logged when cart content extraction is executed for ChromeCart. This histogram records the elapsed time between the start and the end of the extraction JavaScript request execution. This includes script parsing/compilation time and sleeping time.

histogram.name: Commerce.Carts.ExtractionLongestTaskTime
histogram.summary: Logged when cart content extraction is executed for ChromeCart. This histogram records the time span of the longest task blocking the main thread of the renderer process.

histogram.name: Commerce.Carts.ExtractionTimedOut
histogram.summary: Record whether the cart content extraction has timed out. Logged when cart content extraction is executed for ChromeCart.

histogram.name: Commerce.Carts.ExtractionTotalTasksTime
histogram.summary: Logged when cart content extraction is executed for ChromeCart. This histogram records the time spent on execution, excluding sleeping time.

histogram.name: Commerce.Carts.FormSubmitIsTransaction
histogram.summary: Records whether the form submission is a shopping transaction. This has 50% chance randomized. Logged when there's a form submission.

histogram.name: Commerce.Carts.XHRIsAddToCart
histogram.summary: Records whether the XHR is to add a product to a shopping cart. This has 50% chance randomized. Logged when there's an XHR about to be sent.

histogram.name: Commerce.PowerBookmarks.ShoppingDataProvider.FallbackDataContent
histogram.summary: Records whick type of fallback data (javascript on-page heuristics) was used when filling in gaps from Optimization Guide. This does not track whether the page was actually bookmarked, it only indicates what information might be missing or how often we get supplementary images when on a product page.

histogram.name: Commerce.PowerBookmarks.ShoppingDataProvider.FallbackDataUsed
histogram.summary: Records whether fallback data (javascript on-page heuristics) was used to supplement the data provided by Optimization Guide. This does not track whether the page was actually bookmarked.

histogram.name: Commerce.PowerBookmarks.ShoppingDataProvider.IsProductPage
histogram.summary: Records whether a particular navigation was determined to be a product page by Optimization Guide. This doesn not track whether the page was actually bookmarked.

histogram.name: Commerce.PriceDrop.AnnotationsEnabled
histogram.summary: Records whether the price drop annotation is enabled. Recorded when user enters the grid tab switcher. The record frequency is controlled by a feature parameter and by default it is recorded at most once every day. Implemented for Android.

histogram.name: Commerce.PriceDrop.NotificationChannelBlocked
histogram.summary: Records whether the price drop notification channel is blocked by users. Recorded when we initialize commerce subscriptions (For eligible users, we initialize subscriptions when Chrome becomes foreground app but at most once in a one-day moving window). Implemented for Android.

histogram.name: Commerce.PriceDrop.NotificationChannelCreated
histogram.summary: Records whether the price drop notification channel is created. Recorded when we initialize commerce subscriptions (For eligible users, we initialize subscriptions when Chrome becomes foreground app but at most once in a one-day moving window). Implemented for Android.

histogram.name: Commerce.PriceDrop.SystemNotificationEnabled
histogram.summary: Records whether the system notification is enabled by users. Recorded when we initialize commerce subscriptions (For eligible users, we initialize subscriptions when Chrome becomes foreground app but at most once in a one-day moving window). Implemented for Android.

histogram.name: Commerce.PriceDrops.{TabUsageStatus}{LocationIdentifier}.ContainsPrice
histogram.summary: Records if a page contains a price, as determined by the commerce data obtained to power the price drop feature. This data is acquired when the user finishes navigating to a page. Recorded when the user {LocationIdentifier}. Recorded for {TabUsageStatus}.

histogram.name: Commerce.PriceDrops.{TabUsageStatus}{LocationIdentifier}.ContainsPriceDrop
histogram.summary: Records if a page contains a decrease in price for an offer, relative to the previously seen price for the offer. This is determined by the commerce data obtained to power the price drop feature. The data is acquired when the user finishes navigating to a page. Recorded when the user {LocationIdentifier}. Recorded for {TabUsageStatus}.

histogram.name: Commerce.PriceDrops.{TabUsageStatus}{LocationIdentifier}.IsProductDetailPage
histogram.summary: Records if a page is a product detail page, as determined by the commerce data obtained to power the price drop feature. This data is acquired when the user finishes navigating to a page. Recorded when the user {LocationIdentifier}. Recorded for {TabUsageStatus}.

histogram.name: Commerce.Subscriptions.TabEligible
histogram.summary: Records whether a tab is eligible for commerce subscriptions. True when the tab has offer and the tab is stale (Last opened time between 1 and 90 days). Recorded when we initialize commerce subscriptions (For eligible users, we initialize subscriptions when Chrome becomes foreground app but at most once in a one-day moving window). Implemented for Android.
